title: Dialogflow - 使用 API 管理代理
abstract:
# Dialogflow - 使用 API 管理代理
通常，您可以使用控制檯創建和刪除代理。但是，在某些高級場景中，您可能會發現該 API 更易於使用。
content:
## 創建代理
以下示例展示瞭如何爲 `Agent` 類型調用 `Create` 方法。
在使用任何請求數據之前，請先進行以下替換：- ：您的 Google Cloud 項目 ID
- ：您的 [區域 ID](https://cloud.google.com/dialogflow/cx/docs/concept/region?hl=zh-cn) 
HTTP 方法和網址：
```
POST https://REGION_ID-dialogflow.googleapis.com/v3/projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/REGION_ID/agents
```
請求 JSON 正文：
```
{
 "displayName": "My display name",
 "defaultLanguageCode": "en",
 "timeZone": "America/New_York"
}
```
如需發送您的請求，請展開以下選項之一：您應該收到類似以下內容的 JSON 響應：
```
{
 "name": "projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/REGION_ID/agents/AGENT_ID",
 "displayName": "My display name",
 "defaultLanguageCode": "en",
 "timeZone": "America/New_York",
 "startFlow": "projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/REGION_ID/agents/AGENT_ID/flows/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000",
 "advancedSettings": {
 "loggingSettings": {}
 }
}
```
要向 Dialogflow 進行身份驗證，請設置應用默認憑據。  如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [爲本地開發環境設置身份驗證](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/provide-credentials-adc?hl=zh-cn#local-dev) 。
 [在 GitHub 上查看](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples/blob/HEAD/dialogflow-cx/src/main/java/dialogflow/cx/CreateAgent.java) 
```
import com.google.cloud.dialogflow.cx.v3.Agent;import com.google.cloud.dialogflow.cx.v3.Agent.Builder;import com.google.cloud.dialogflow.cx.v3.AgentsClient;import com.google.cloud.dialogflow.cx.v3.AgentsSettings;import java.io.IOException;public class CreateAgent {  public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {    // TODO(developer): Replace these variables before running the sample.    String projectId = "my-project-id";    String displayName = "my-display-name";    createAgent(projectId, displayName);  }  public static Agent createAgent(String parent, String displayName) throws IOException {    String apiEndpoint = "global-dialogflow.googleapis.com:443";    AgentsSettings agentsSettings = AgentsSettings.newBuilder().setEndpoint(apiEndpoint).build();    // Note: close() needs to be called on the AgentsClient object to clean up resources    // such as threads. In the example below, try-with-resources is used,    // which automatically calls close().    try (AgentsClient client = AgentsClient.create(agentsSettings)) {      // Set the details of the Agent to create      Builder build = Agent.newBuilder();      build.setDefaultLanguageCode("en");      build.setDisplayName(displayName);      // Correct format for timezone is location/city      // For example America/Los_Angeles, Europe/Madrid, Asia/Tokyo      build.setTimeZone("America/Los_Angeles");      Agent agent = build.build();      String parentPath = String.format("projects/%s/locations/%s", parent, "global");      // Calls the create agent api and returns the created Agent      Agent response = client.createAgent(parentPath, agent);      System.out.println(response);      return response;    }  }}
```要向 Dialogflow 進行身份驗證，請設置應用默認憑據。  如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [爲本地開發環境設置身份驗證](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/provide-credentials-adc?hl=zh-cn#local-dev) 。
 [在 GitHub 上查看](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/nodejs-docs-samples/blob/HEAD/dialogflow-cx/create-agent.js) 
```
const parent = 'projects/' + projectId + '/locations/global';const api_endpoint = 'global-dialogflow.googleapis.com';const agent = {  displayName: displayName,  defaultLanguageCode: 'en',  timeZone: 'America/Los_Angeles',};const {AgentsClient} = require('@google-cloud/dialogflow-cx');const client = new AgentsClient({apiEndpoint: api_endpoint});async function setAgentSample() {  const request = {    agent,    parent,  };  const [response] = await client.createAgent(request);  console.log(`response: ${JSON.stringify(response, null, 2)}`);  // Delete created agent resource  client.deleteAgent({name: response.name});}await setAgentSample();
```要向 Dialogflow 進行身份驗證，請設置應用默認憑據。  如需瞭解詳情，請參閱 [爲本地開發環境設置身份驗證](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/provide-credentials-adc?hl=zh-cn#local-dev) 。
 [在 GitHub 上查看](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/python-docs-samples/blob/HEAD/dialogflow-cx/create_agent.py) 
```
from google.cloud.dialogflowcx_v3.services.agents.client import AgentsClientfrom google.cloud.dialogflowcx_v3.types.agent import Agentdef create_agent(project_id, display_name):    parent = "projects/" + project_id + "/locations/global"    agents_client = AgentsClient()    agent = Agent(        display_name=display_name,        default_language_code="en",        time_zone="America/Los_Angeles",    )    response = agents_client.create_agent(request={"agent": agent, "parent": parent})    return response
```
## 刪除代理
以下示例展示瞭如何爲 `Agent` 類型調用 `Delete` 方法。
在使用任何請求數據之前，請先進行以下替換：- ：您的 Google Cloud 項目 ID
- ：您的 [區域 ID](https://cloud.google.com/dialogflow/cx/docs/concept/region?hl=zh-cn) 
- ：您的代理 ID，可在代理創建響應中找到
HTTP 方法和網址：
```
DELETE https://REGION_ID-dialogflow.googleapis.com/v3/projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/REGION_ID/agents/AGENT_ID
```
如需發送您的請求，請展開以下選項之一：您應該會收到一個成功的狀態代碼 (2xx) 和一個空響應。
